sn36.11:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn36.11:1.2: “idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi—
sn36.11:1.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.11:1.8: Kim nu kho etam bhagavata sandhaya bhasitam:
sn36.11:2.2: Tisso ima, bhikkhu, vedana vutta maya.
sn36.11:2.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.11:2.7: Tam kho panetam, bhikkhu, maya sankharanamyeva aniccatam sandhaya bhasitam:
sn36.11:2.9: Tam kho panetam, bhikkhu, maya sankharanamyeva khayadhammatam …pe…
sn36.11:2.15: Atha kho pana, bhikkhu, maya anupubbasankharanam nirodho akkhato.
sn36.11:2.16: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca niruddha hoti.
sn36.11:2.17: Dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara niruddha honti.
sn36.11:2.18: Tatiyam jhanam samapannassa piti niruddha hoti.
sn36.11:2.19: Catuttham jhanam samapannassa assasapassasa niruddha honti.
sn36.11:2.24: Sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca niruddha honti.
sn36.11:2.25: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.11:2.26: Atha kho, bhikkhu, maya anupubbasankharanam vupasamo akkhato.
sn36.11:2.27: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca vupasanta hoti.
sn36.11:2.28: Dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara vupasanta honti …pe…
sn36.11:2.29: sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca vupasanta honti.
sn36.11:2.30: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago vupasanto hoti, doso vupasanto hoti, moho vupasanto hoti.
sn36.11:2.32: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa vaca patippassaddha hoti.
sn36.11:2.33: Dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara patippassaddha honti.
sn36.11:2.34: Tatiyam jhanam samapannassa piti patippassaddha hoti.
sn36.11:2.35: Catuttham jhanam samapannassa assasapassasa patippassaddha honti.
sn36.11:2.36: Sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca patippassaddha honti.
sn36.11:2.37: Khinasavassa bhikkhuno rago patippassaddho hoti, doso patippassaddho hoti, moho patippassaddho hoti”ti.
